item.description:
If you were here last year you know what a true Halloween spectacle it really was.

1000 costumed festival goers converged on CBC to enjoy over 15 different pumpkin ales at the bar, in the beer garden and at the satellite pouring stations. They devoured bratwurst on the patio and watched the ceremonial tapping of the giant beer filled pumpkin. There was a pumpkin inspired menu inside, spooky decorations, hay bales, corn stalks, crazy lights and tons of Halloween shenanigans.

Maybe you'll unlock RedPint's Jolly Latern medal!
http://www.redpint.co...

This year will feature over 22 different pumpkin ales and all the same Halloween shenanigans to boot.

Tickets are $10 and includes admission and a limited-edition pumpkin beer glass. Hizzah!

Check out the poster:
http://cambridgebrewi...
item.name: Great Pumpkin Fest
